_header: Saint Michael in November hath yet another day
Note: For Part I, see 4732; for Part III, see 5451.
_description: Part II of ‘St. Michael’ in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodAsh43.First Lines:
SEyn Michel In nouembre haþ ek anoþer dayBiuore þe
                    feste of seynt Luc as ic ȝou telle may…
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…Vor þei hi out of helle be hi ne schulleþ so at
                    routeþat hi þe bernynges of helle wiþ hem ne bereþ
                    aboute
BodAsh43.Note: Part I occurs elsewhere in this MS (see 4732-1).

Bod779.First Lines:
Seint mychel in nouembre haþ ek anoþer dayby fore þe
                    feste of seint luk as ich ȝou telle may…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…& þat we moot oure soules saue & come to þilke
                    blisseÞat euere is wit outen ende & neuer ne chal
                    mysse

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
SEint Mihel in Nouembre haþ ek a noþur dayBi fore þe
                    ffeste of seint Luk as I ow telle may…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…ffor þauh þei out of helle ben þei schulle
                    nouȝwher routeÞat þei þe brennynge of helle wiþ
                    hem heo bereþ a boute
BodEngPoeta1.Note: With Part I; III occurs later in the MS (f. 291vb).

                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
Seint Michel in Nouembre haþ eke an oþer daybifore
                    þe feste of seint luk As I ȝou telle may…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…ffor þauh þei out of helle beo þei ne shul so at
                    routeþat þei þe brenyng of helle Wiþ he ne beren
                    aboute
BodLauMis463.Note: Two columns per page, one full-line, the other half-line.

CULAdd3039.First Lines:
Sayn myghell þe archangell & hiis felaws alsoAre be twene
                    god & vs to chew what we sall doA day þei hafe in þe
                    ȝere thuþh all cristindamBe a meracle of sayn myghell þat
                    holy day vs cam…
CULAdd3039.Last Lines:
…ffro þat fire he vs cheld πat lord is most of
                    myghtThurgh þe praier of sayn Myghell prynce of angels bryght Amen

CULFf548.First Lines:
In þe monethe of septembere he haues a noþer dayeBe for
                    þe fest of sant luke als I you tell may…
CULFf548.Last Lines:
…Saynt Mighell þe archangel to þe we crieþ &
                    prayQuen we are dede oure saules þu lede to blisse þat lastis
                    ay
CULFf548.Editions:
Downing,  Janay Young A.,
                        ed.  
             “A Critical Edition of Cambridge University MS Ff.5.48.” 
         2 vols. Diss. University of Washington, 1969: 215-27.

CamCCC145.First Lines:
Sein Michel in nouembre haþ ek anoþer dayBiuore þe
                    feste of sein luc as ich ȝou telle may…
CamCCC145.Last Lines:
…ffor þei hi out of helle be hy ne ssolle so at
                    routeÞat hi þe bernynge of helle wiþ hom ne bereþ
                    aboute
CamCCC145.Attributed Title: De Sancto Michaele in monte tomba (f. 150)
CamCCC145.Editions:
D’Evelyn,  Charlotte,  and  A. J. Mill, eds.  
             The South English Legendary: Corpus Christi College Cambridge MS. 145
                and British Museum MS. Harley 2277, with variants from Bodley MS. Ashmole 43 and
                British Museum MS. Cotton Julius D.ix.
EETS

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Seint Michel in Nouembre haþ an oþer dayBy ffore þe
                    ffeste of Seint Luk as ich ȝow telle may…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…Now god ffor þe loue of Seint Michel vs lete such lif
                    ledeÞat we mote to heuene come after þat we beoþ
                    dede

CamTCC605.First Lines:
SEint michel in nouembre haþ eke an oþer dayby for
                    þe feste of seint luc as ic ȝou telle may…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…for þey hii oute of helle be hii ne schulleþ so at
                    routeþat hii þe bernyng of helle with hem ne bereþ
                    aboute

BLAdd10301.First Lines:
SEin Michel in nouembre haþ eke anoþer dayBy fore þe
                    feste of sein Luke as y ȝou telle May
BLAdd10301.Last Lines:
…for þey he oute of helle be hy ne ssolle so at
                    routeþat hy þe bernynge of helle wiþ hom ne bereþ
                    aboute
BLAdd10301.Attributed Title:
De sancto Michaele in Monte tomba (f. 171v, by scribe in
                    margin beside first line); Michaele (RT)

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: SEyn myhel in nouembre haþ ek anoþer daibifore þe feste of sein luc as ȝou ich telle mai…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …for þei hi out of helle be hi ne schollet so a routeþat hi þe bernynges of helle with hom ne bereþ aboute
BLCottJulDIX.Note: “Capitulum lxviii” added to left margin by later hand (f. 149v).

Digital Facsimile of British Library  Cotton Julius MS D IX.

BLEge1993.First Lines: SEint Miȝhel in nouembre haþ eke anoþer dayBifore þe feste of seint luc as ich ȝou telle may…
BLEge1993.Last Lines: …Sen heo out of helle ben icome s...sley so at route..... þe fire of helle ....... aboute
BLEge1993.Note: Water damage has obscured parts of last lines.

BLEge2891.First Lines: SEin Michel in nouembre haþ eke anoþer dayByuore þe feste of Sein Luk as ich ȝou telle may…
BLEge2891.Last Lines: …ffor þei hi out of helle beo hi ne ssolde so at routeþat In þe bernynge of helle wiþ hom ne bereþ aboute
BLEge2891.Note: With I and III; lines 1-4 missing.

BLHar2277.First Lines: Seint Miȝel in Nouembre haþ ek anoþer dayBifore þe feste of Seint Luc as ich ȝou telle may…
BLHar2277.Last Lines: …ffor þeȝ hit out of helle beo hi ne schulle so atrouteÞat hi þe brennynge of helle wiþ hem ne bereþ aboute
BLHar2277.Note: Not marked as a new text by an enlarged initial as others in this manuscript.

BLSto949.First Lines: Seynt Michel in nouembre haþ Eke anoþer dayby fore þe feste of sent Luk as ich ȝou telle may…
BLSto949.Last Lines: …for þey hii out of helle ben hii ne schulle nouȝt at routeþat hii þe brennynge of helle wiþ heom ne bereþ aboute
BLSto949.Note:
Interrupted by 5451; ends “Amen”; Brown  and  Robbins (1943)
XCarleton Fairchild Brown,   and  Rossell Hope Robbins.  
             The Index of Middle English Verse.
         New York: Printed for the Index Society by Columbia University Press,
            1943 records this as beginning on f. 2.

CollArmsAr8.First Lines:
Seynt Michael in Nouembre hath eke a nother dayBifore the feste of
                    Seint luke as I yow telle may…
CollArmsAr8.Last Lines:
…ffor that þei oute of helle þei ne shullen nouȝt so
                    aroutethat þei the brynnyng of hell with hem beryn aboute
CollArmsAr8.Attributed Title:
Sancti Michelis in monte tumba (f. 70v, margin, in
                    rubric)

Lam223.First Lines:
Saynt Michel in Nouembre has ȝett anoþer dayBifore
                    þe feste of saynt luke as I telle may…
Lam223.Last Lines:
…Now god þat vs soule ȝafe graunte vs hit so
                    redeÞat saynt Mighel hit mot fonde & tofore oure lord lede
                    Amen
